lender.name: David

lender.name: Boya Jiang

lender.name: Gabe
lender.occupation: Automotive Repair Service, family owned & operated
lender.loan_because: This is a way everyone can help each other. The every day ordinary people have so much to offer this world. They will give their last dollar to a person whom they feel is in more need than themselves. That's the greatest spirit of the human race. Helping each other and being kind. Simle, it cost nothing and can be inspiring to so many.
lender.occupational_info: We repair auto vehicles in the Cityview area of Fort Worth, TX. My wife & I worked for this business prior to us buying it in Jan 2008. We have been in business for 1 &1/2 yrs now but working this specific location for over 3 1/2 years. We have great customers that we do our best to help and make payment arrangements with if needed. We strive to give great customer satisfaction and a sincere friendly experience with our small business. During this economic slow down, we have experienced cash flow problems. My mother came to assist me with the Buy Sell and establishment of this business in late 2007, assisted with the organization of operations, accounting, CPA selection and corporate fillings. She became ill with her Multiple Sclerosis and was unable to assist for several months. She also had to have surgery on her C-spine to repair disc & other issues involving the spinal canal. She is now able to help us get our accounting methods improved & simplified which will assist in time management, better business decisions and ability to keep providing jobs. She will be able to help with marketing and accounting at home as we now are setup with QuickBooks Online. This will give my wife and myself more time to concentrate on giving our customers our very best and giving back to the community. We employee 2 full time and 2 part-time employees but would like to hire more. We need operating cash for marketing and reorganizing our accounting and payables methods. Since we are younger and have experienced new business obstacles, we have learned but cannot go for traditional loans at this time. I work on vehicles myself and my wife works the front counter and back office as well. We work Monday - Saturday and care about our customers and this world we live in. My wife is bilingual and is great working with people. She hears what they need and does everything she can so we can help them get back on the road, back to work or what ever their automotive needs are. We would like to be able to get a used car license in the future to add another service to our customers. We have been able to help our customers save by being able to repair vehicles that many would have not tried to fix. My employees are like family. They go through each day with us with hope and determination. As stated before we are truly a family business. Our accounting office also accommodates our 3 beautiful children when they are not in school or with their grandparents. We love this Kiva concept and hope to get loans that we will repay and become a continual lender as well. We will be spreading the word about this website to all we know. Thank you Kiva for this opportunity. Gabe Randall, Randall's Automotive Services, Fort Worth, TX

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: When I was a teenager my family was in poor financial standing at Christmas was rapidly approaching. One day shortly before Christmas a police officer knocked on our door with an envelope in hand that someone had anonymously given him inside was a check which gave us the money to get out of our financial hole and enjoy a Merry Christmas. My mother never forgot this act and later despite being rendered a quadriplegic and having desperate need to hold on to every penny she had she gave me $1000 and told me to give it to someone who can get themselves back on their feet again. I searched for years and never found someone I hope that by donating the money here I can help several people and fulfill my mother's wishes as well

lender.occupational_info: Locally, I am involved in Prison Ministry and with my church's ministry to help folks give charitable donations in lieu of commerical gifts. - I take care of my 91-year-old mother, and Mom lives with me and my best firend of 25+ years. - The photo is of a tree frog among my plumeria trees.

lender.name: romeo
lender.loan_because:
Our Company is always looking for ways to expand its revenue and market share within the existing market. Plans are being formulated to add a catalog to its retail operation. This will permit us to expand the sales territory of our after-market products to a national level. Once established, consideration will be given to worldwide distribution of the fuel saving device
There are similarities in the production of fuel saving device. This firm is looking at several possibilities at this time. The company has sixty percent of the equipment needed to manufacture fuel saving device. This firm has not ruled out the possibility of further mergers and acquisitions to enter this market. We are interested in expanding our area to other parts worldwide which is why we are looking some working capital
lender.occupational_info: We are into the manufacturing and marketing company producing a FUEL SAVING DEVICE that improves FUEL COMBUSTION of any internal combustion engine. The device was invented to MAXIMIZE an engines' performance at a fraction of the usual cost of the popular HOT RODDING techniques. Besides giving 10-20% added engine power it also gives 1.) 20-50% added mileage/savings, 2.) 95% Less Air Pollution, 3.) Less 30% Maintenance Cost, 4.) 30% Longer engine life. At the moment we are in the PHILIPPINE

lender.occupational_info: My work has universal appeal. I want to create not only musical products but graphic art work that is contemporary and preserves our culture here in the U.S., Africa and across the world. lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: Over the past several years, I've read a myriad of books from the first person perspective about what it means to live in various regions around the world. It's really pretty simple cutting corners on my part can make a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.occupational_info: I help people be more effective and satisfied at work.

lender.name: Alli
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of the people whose businesses I invest in. I greatly admire their energy, creativity, and entrepreneurial spirit. I have benefitted from others' investments in my ability to accomplish my goals, and in turn, I hope to invest in others' goals. Most important, I wish to share God's love and blessings with my brothers and sisters around the world. I hope the entrepreneurs in whose businesses I have invested find financial and personal prosperity.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and I hope my small contributions can help in some way.

lender.name: Rinendra
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I care:) I have been blessed with many opportunities; an education, a loving supportive family and good health. It's important to support others and to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother, daughter and friend. I take care of my family and volunteer in my community. I have lived in the same town for 50 years and love it here.

lender.name: Jannie
lender.loan_because: Poverty should not cripple someone's dreams, success, and financial independence,.. I love all of the stories written on this website. It's truly a blessing to share with others who are in dire need of funding to start a business to improve their lives and the local community. Through Kiva, I know my contribution would make a significant difference in someone else's life and local communities.
lender.occupational_info:
On behalf of New York Cares organization, I volunteer and Team-Lead a children's literacy project at a transitional shelter in my community. I plan and implement innovative reading and craft activities for the children living at the shelter.
I also work on a separate project at the shelter with the adults. Their program is called "Job Readiness" a project co-leader with another person on assisting clients with the various process of interviewing skills, resume writing skills. Tools and knowledge they would need to help them transition into the work force. As a Independenty Beauty Consultant, I touch women's lives daily when I share and coach the possibilities the Mary Kay business has to offer. . With so little to start up and a supportive team on your side is all that is needed to make a dream come true and say good bye to Poverty!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: giving is twice blessed. it blesses the one who receives and also the one who gives and it is God's will.
lender.occupational_info: hard working musician trying to make good music with a message, so that i can contribute to make the world a better place for all who hear the music i play.
